name: pyload
tagline: A self-hosted download manager with automation support
description: pyLoad is a self-hosted download manager focused on file hosting services and automation. It supports plugins, scheduling, and a web UI for queue management and link handling.

features.title: REST API
features.description: Download from hundreds of file hosting services including Mega, Rapidgator, and MediaFire

features.title: Queue Management
features.description: Organize downloads in queues with priorities, categories, and scheduling

features.title: Plugin System
features.description: Extend functionality with plugins for new hosters, captcha solvers, and automation

features.title: Tagging System
features.description: Set download times to take advantage of off-peak hours or unlimited bandwidth periods

features.title: Mobile Responsive
features.description: Manage downloads through a responsive web UI accessible from any device

features.title: High Performance
features.description: Store premium account credentials for faster downloads and no waiting times
